properties.name: 1. Home
properties.description: Posted by CmrodenThe starting point for our road trip. We got a much later start than expected which created a few surprises later on the trip. It was also the ending point for the road trip.

properties.name: 10. Ticket
properties.description: Posted by CmrodenOn the way back to Tennessee I got pulled over and was given my first speeding ticket. It put a bit of a damper on the trip but it was the only thing bad that happened during the trip.

properties.name: 2. Hotel
properties.description: Posted by CmrodenÂ 5531 Athens Boonesboro Rd. , Lexington, KY, US, 40509This is the hotel we stayed in while we were in Lexington, KY. The woman at the front desk was a little scary and there every time we came or left, like she never slept or something.

properties.name: 3. Winery
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden 7086 Tates Creek Road, Lexington, KYWe had read that there were a few wineries in Lexington and thought it would be fun to check one at out. Unfortunately we got to this one right as it closed...

properties.name: 4. Place we were told was a winery
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden4379 Old Harrodsburg Rd, lexington, kyAfter the first winery was closed we thought we would try a different one. We found an add listing it as a winery and thought we would check it out. When we got there we found out it was just an upscale wine store.

properties.name: 5. Keeneland Race Track
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden 4201 Versailles Road, lexington kyA race track we visited while in Lexington. We decided to go here because of the history it has but also because they supposedly have a really good brunch. Unfortunately we couldn\'t find the kitchen. There was also a Garden and Antique show being held there that we accidentally snuck into. And drive through betting but there were no races going on so we didn\'t get to try that out.

properties.name: 6. Alcatraz Brewing Co.
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden49 W. Maryland St. indanapolis, inOur first stop in Indiana. Good burgers and good beer.

properties.name: 7. Hagen's Home
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden1824 Ridgewood circle, south bend, inWe stayed at my boyfriend\'s parent\'s house while we were in Indana. It was nice to see where my boyfriend was from and visit with his family. On Easter we had an Easter egg hunt that was a lot of fun.

properties.name: 8. Notre Dame, University of
properties.description: Posted by CmrodenThis is where my boyfriend\'s mom works. And also where my boyfriend went for a while. One of the days that we were visiting we went on a tour of the campus.

properties.name: 9. Four Winds Casino
properties.description: Posted by Cmroden11111 Wilson Rd New Buffalo, MIFor Saint Patrick\'s Day we went gambling in Michigan. It was my first time going to Michigan as well as my first time going to a casino. I lost about 0 but we had a lot of fun, especially at the bar.
